name: Fantasy Mini Battle
description:
• Graphic Style: Low poly
  • Language: Russian, English
  • Access: Early access
  • Distributed: shareware (f2p)
  • Engine: Unity
  • Platforms: Windows, Mac, Android, iOS
  • Number of players: from 2
  • Multiplayer: present
  • AI support: available
  • Difficulty AI: Easy, medium and hard with real-time development (randomly selected depending on player statistics)
  • Approximate playing time: 5-15 min
  • Release Date: ~Q4 2021

A mini-game in the genre of Castle Defense from the Guild "Cheramor" based on the map on WarCraft 3 - Battle of Heroes III.

Choose one of the races and join the battle with the enemy! The army of the race is actively developing during the battle. After the battle, in the main menu of the game you can improve each type individually. The more often you buy one of the types of troops, the faster they develop.

We decided to make a project in the Castle Defense genre, like Heroes III Battle, only with its own setting, mechanics and development progress. There is support for a real-time multiplayer game.

Approximate system requirements:

  • CPU: 2 x 1.8 GHz
  • RAM: 2 Gb
  • GPU: 810 MHz
  • OS: win (x64), android 4.4 or higher
